website_summaries.verdict: Cute design helps take one's mind away from nausea-related effects.
pros: Great for kids to use, and college students who may have imbibed a bit too much
Comical design adds a touch of humor in situations that usually lack such
Designed to seal tightly as well
cons: Professional drivers may find bags are taken as souvenir

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I was so nauseous my first trimester in pregnancy. I put these bags in my car, around the apartment, in my purse, and at work. Highly recommend to every pregnant woman! I've thrown up many times during my pregnancy and I've never had an accident, this bag saved me from a lot of accidents!
customer_reviews.author: Gracia Moore

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from migraines and motion sickness that come on suddenly so I always have at least one of these bags in my purse and car. They're adorable and make throwing up kind of fun (not really). I appreciate that they're really sturdy and don't leak. I'd rather use these than the plastic disc/bags from hospitals since these are more convenient and there's no spillage. They've also helped people around me who have gotten sick and weren't prepared. Keep one of these bags, some tissue, and mints as a vomit kit and you're set.
customer_reviews.author: Shoegal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy close, stores well until you can dispose it
customer_reviews.text: I'm going through chemotherapy and have personally used the whole pack. The glue is better on these than the other vomit emoji bags. I like rolling down the paper sack compared to the plastic twist that doctors offices use because the bag is more convenient storage until you find a trash can. I've used these at home, in the car, abd on the go. They're the best!! Leak proof even on a full stomach. #chemo
customer_reviews.author: Case

customer_reviews.title: Keep these in your car for car sickness emergencies!
customer_reviews.text: These come in really handy to keep in the car if car sickness is a problem. What I like about these is: 1. They aren't see through like other types of barf bags (who wants to look at that when you're running it to the trash can!) 2. The top closure helps contain the smell The panda image is cute and the kids think it's funny, but the printed words gross me out a little -- I mean, if you're already feeling ill, reading "I feel the urge to vomit" on this bag might just send you over the edge! :(
customer_reviews.author: The Purista

customer_reviews.title: REALLY CUTE
customer_reviews.text: So I Drive for UBER/LYFT and having this in the car is definitely a PLUS especially cause I have a lexus and leather seats. I've gotten compliments for it. Definitely worth the purchase and when i run out, will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: John Hiep Tran

customer_reviews.title: Humerous but effective
customer_reviews.text: The picture and writing on the bag is a source of humor at least among the pilots. Kind of quirky. I think passengers will get the idea of the purpose quite clearly if they need it. I like the fact that it is similar in size and shape to the airline bags which most people have seen. The plastic bags that come in a blue envelope are more confusing for passengers and require explanation. We haven't had the need to use one yet so I can't speak to the actual performance when needed.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Rask

customer_reviews.title: Best Barf Bag Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friend who gets sick frequently. I gave them to her on Tuesday and she has already used one at work. Aside from practicality, they are hysterical! They will be useful at the next faculty meeting to send a clear message to the ass of a dean---those in dissent can just raise a bag!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Love

customer_reviews.title: The material of the bag seems like it will guarantee no leakage.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not only useful, it is just too cute. I'm an Uber driver and luckily have never had a rider need this product. However, I have had a few "go missing" because people think they are so handy and so cute. I only put one in the front and two in the back at a time because they are irresistible.
customer_reviews.author: K. Magin

customer_reviews.title: must have for anyone
customer_reviews.text: we do uber on the side and usualky nights. the very day these arrived they came in handy as one customer had too much to drink he grabbed for our trash can and i handed him one of these. perfect no trash can to clean up and he took it with him so no mess fg or me or the vehicle. reccomend greatly if u do rideshare or long family trips
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: I have only had one of my riders use them so far and they did the job. I am an uber/lyft driver who does a lot of late nights. I have drunks all the time and Have had the misfortune of having to clean up puke. These save the day and my passenger a lot of money in clean up fee. Not to mention the disgusting job of me having to clean it up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Females  Are not happy when I tell them to hold the bag.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Uber Driver. When I see a passenger is about to get sick I give him Or her a sick bag and they are very appreciated is saves me time and money specially on a Friday or Saturday night. I always have them in the car I just finish ordering 300 for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Thick enough to do the job!
customer_reviews.text: These "barf" bags were the perfect size and thickness for the job. Would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: SPar

customer_reviews.title: These Barf bags are some serious barf bags! I ...
customer_reviews.text: These Barf bags are some serious barf bags! I put them to the test on my nephews 21st birthday!! The can handle barf from anything that walks or crawls!!!
customer_reviews.author: peter j mcgough

customer_reviews.title: Great item to have around. Just I case....
customer_reviews.text: Always handy to have!! Also bc it’s not clear it’s more discreet. And you can hide them in a bag or purse.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Molina

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as described, cute image, well made, appropriate for use by the car sick, pregnant, ill, and intoxicated! I drive for Uber and Lyft, and get lots of positive comments on them. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sue B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute but leaks sometimes. Have to double or triple bag it.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy Chuidian

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have at a moment's notice
customer_reviews.text: Very handy - we have them in our car. My wife has used one so far. I expect she will use them all before Dec. 31. Thanks - We have them in a cloth bag for easy storage and access.
customer_reviews.author: James Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Purchased the bags because both of my kids (8&3) get ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the bags because both of my kids (8&3) get car sick and the family was going on a 500 mile trip. They came in handy on the return trip and they worked perfectly! Being able to tear off the top to tie the bags helped control any smell and spillage!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Good to have For Über drivers
customer_reviews.text: I love them I use them for when I’m Driving for Über when I pick up the drunks at night or whenever someone feels carsick
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I love them...I am an Uber driver and they not only serve their purpose.... but are great conversation pieces in the truck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable bags
customer_reviews.text: I like the funny design for a bit so funny situation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bravo!!!
customer_reviews.text: Better than I had hoped for! Great for the car and plane. Quick shipping and would definitely order again! Bravo!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: These are the only bags I order anymore because they work great don't leak and are easy for kids to use without spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Nice cute way to display for your riders
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and effective! Nice cute way to display for your riders!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for vomiting and adds a little smile on your face when having to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Oligmueller

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I used it as a fun party gift dor an adukt bday party.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Does What it's Supposed To Do
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly how it's described. I'm very pleased with the delivery time, and functionality of this product. Thaaaank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Allan M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very useful item. nice bags to carry and put in my own bag, and very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Yaxin Liu

customer_reviews.title: Extremely effective
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever. It might seem little pricey but it’s so worth it. Pros: 1. Really holds its shape when one is throwing up. 2. The lock mechanism is both spill proof and smell proof. 3. No smell afterwards. 4) environment friendly. Cons 1) price maybe, but not much in light of all the positives.
customer_reviews.author: mommyandson

customer_reviews.title: problem saver
customer_reviews.text: Family member has reaction to cancer treatments. We keep the bags in many places so they are handy when needed.....in car..and any room in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Hope I don't run out. If I need more than 50, no more car rides.
customer_reviews.author: Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Best Idea!
customer_reviews.text: These bags ate the best idea!! I carry them in my car as one of my kids is prone to car sickness. They are sturdy and easy to use and dispose of. Peace of mind for our vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Ann

customer_reviews.title: they do the job
customer_reviews.text: Was waiting until someone tested this in my vehicle. It finally happened. Very glad I had them. Passenger was sick and used 2 of these and there was no smell and the bag closed and kept contents.
customer_reviews.author: JoshTorresDJ

customer_reviews.title: Yes mom. I no longer have ti barf on your lap
customer_reviews.text: I can fill it with barf and it works. Would probably work with extrament as well
customer_reviews.author: SemiMBA

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to keep in my Uber after 1 rider vomited in my car
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to keep in my Uber after 1 rider vomited in my car. Only problem the bags are so cute riders keep taking them as a novelty souvenir.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the airline bags
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter gets car sick easily and these are perfect for keeping an already icky situation bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Amber oatman

customer_reviews.title: SCAM!!!
customer_reviews.text: ZERO STARS! Bought these because I thought the picture on the bag was funny but it was a BIG MISTAKE. When my wife needed to use the bag it leaked all over my car. These bags are a scam! They can not hold vomit. Terrible quality! I should have bought a good quality bag without the dumb picture on it. What good are the pictures if the bag can't hold vomit. DONT BUY THESE BAGS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: 50 Pack Disposable Barf Bags, Throw up Bags for Car Sick Kids, Airline Travel Motion & Morning Sickness, Pregnancy - Travel Motion Sickness Vomit Bags
product_meta.description: Each bag is coated with leakproof polyethylene inside. It features a metal tab at the top of the bag that allows you to seal the bag tightly until it can be disposed of. A printed funny meme panda on every bag will make those unfortunate situations feel much less serious. Whether you are car sick kids, pregnant women, or drunk Uber/Lift passengers, these bags will help keep messes to a minimum, and you no longer have to use plastic shopping bags or garbage bags.
feature_bullets: [Meme print] Humorous pattern makes unfortunate situations feel much less serious
[Leak proof] Premium, extra sturdy, leak resistant, polyethylene lined paper vomit sickness bag
[Convenient] Portable, discrete & disposable. Metal tin ties keep contents secure
[Various occasions] Perfect for car sick kids, pregnant women, Uber/Lift drunk passengers, chemotherapy patients, airline barf bags etc.
